Great lighting for the night and plenty of natural light during the day. Room comes with coffee machine and cattle for hot tea. Fully stock with mineral water. Love that the hotel having environment policy reducing waste especially plastics. Great job by housekeeping Sandra & Wikanda. Room 507 on the other hand requires reupholster of both side and working chairs. The carpet requires replacement due to stubborn stains and heavy usage. Breakfast was tasty with good selection of both local and continental choices. Staff at breakfast are very attentive and diligent serving with a smile even when the hotel was having a high occupancy rate. Great job Irfan & Silvi leading a dedicated team of Elsa, Wira, Ramadhan & Hazkel. Some arrived even before 5 am to do the set up (noticed when I came down for my morning walk). Pool and gym are available at level 8. However, during my stay the pool was closed a couple of days for thorough cleaning. As the hotel is centrally located easy access to ever parts of the city. Only 45 min from the airport. Plenty of international and local restaurants, cafes and even street vendors.

We chose a privilege room with a really high expectation for some easiness. But there were few confusions when we arrived at the hotel. It was 1.30 pm when we checked in, receptionists said, room wasn't ready yet since we arrived 30 minutes earlier (we understood, that was normal). They asked us to wait at lobby and suggested us to use our privilege card (they gave us before) and enjoy free afternoon tea at nearby restaurant. First confusion: waiter said we can only use privilege card at 4-7 pm. Okay that wasn't a big deal to us to be honest. Then we bought some meals at resto on our own. Second confusion: again our privilege card was rejected when we asked for discount. Previously we were informed that privilege card holder will get 10% off for every meals we purchased at resto. But we didn't get the discount since we weren't officially guest hotel yet (because we didn't get our room at that time). Third confusion: It was 2.40 pm when we finished our lunch. We asked whether our room was ready or not. It was almost 1 hour since normal check in time, but room was not ready yet (again). We had to wait again and saw so many other guests checked in and got their room immediately while we were still waiting for our room, and wondered what was the point of being privileged guest? Anyway rest of our stay was good and we really enjoyed our time so much, we hope they can fix check ins, particularly for privileged guest. Check in 3/5 F&B 4/5 Facility/service 4/5 Kids activity 5/5 (our kid really enjoyed the cooking class) Check out 5/5 (finally we can use our privilege card for late check out) Many thanks
